title: Dove Men+Care Antiperspirant Stick, Invisible 2.7 oz, 4 Count
description: For a deodorant that does not leave marks on your clothes and prevents yellow stains on your clothes while providing 48 hours of protection, try Dove Men+Care Invisible Antiperspirant. It tackles white deodorant stains head on and is invisible on 100 colors. This men's antiperspirant gives you powerful 48-hour protection against sweat and odor that has a warm and bright scent with notes of citrus and spice. Plus the unique 1/4 moisturizer technology is designed to actively protect skin. Dermatologically proven, Dove Men+Care Invisible Dry Antiperspirant Stick is tough on sweat, not on skin. Stay dry without white marks with Dove Men+Care Invisible antiperspirant stick. To complete your daily regimen, try Dove Men + Care Clean Comfort Body Wash and Fresh Clean Shampoo + Conditioner for complete care for your body. Have you already tried Invisible Antiperspirant stick and want to try a dry spray that won't leave white marks? Try Dove Men + Care Invisible or Invisible Fresh Dry Spray for a fresh start to your morning or quick odor and wetness protecting boost during the day as well as protecting you and your clothes from deodorant marks, it sprays on dry so you can get dressed immediately after application.
